Claim: "Fears of sea-level rise are barely scratching the surface of what terrors are possible"
Implication: "Global warming is a source of terror"
Referring expressions: Fears, sea-level rise, terrors  Global warming, terror
Formula: (exists c (exists b (exists a (IsScratching(a,b) and ArePossible(c)))) & (forall g (forall f (forall h ( IsSourceOf(f,g) ->   ArePossible(h)))))) -> (exists d (exists a (IsSourceOf(d,a))))
